mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE userId=#{userId} and cartId=#{cartId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET num=#{num} WHERE cartId = #{cartId} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user.userId as userId,cartId,num,cart.goodId,price,good.name,profile,stock,soldSum,goodtype.name as goodType,goodtype.goodTypeId FROM user,cart,good,goodtype WHERE user.email=#{email} AND cart.userId=user.userId AND cart.goodId=good.goodId AND goodtype.goodTypeId=good.goodTypeId;
